AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Dwarf pathfinder
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME spent HIS early years, as many dwarf-children do, aiding the miners. HECAP used HIS smaller body to crawl through narrow openings to find pathways through tunnels, both new and old, that led to precious minerals.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Dwarf refugee
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Torn from HIS home at an early age, NAME had to grow up sooner rather than later.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Dwarf guarded child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: As a child, NAME spent HIS childhood under incredible care and watchful eyes. HISCAP parents made sure no harm or conflict came to HIM.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Dwarf warrior family
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Growing up with a family of warriors gave NAME a lot of practice wrestling, playing with toy weapons, and firing slingshots. Books were rarely on the table, however.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Dwarf miner
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME was a miner. HECAP was instrumental in carving out the mountain fortresses of the dwarf-kingdoms.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Dwarf blacksmith
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME was a master craftsman renowned among the Free Peoples of the World for HIS masterwork weapons and armor.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Dwarf forager
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: As a forager, NAME would have to leave the stronghold in order to forage and hunt for food on the mountainsides.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Dwarf soldier
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME served as a soldier for his stronghold. HE learned to use the axe and bow with precision, which helped HIM built a career defending the stronghold against outside threats.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Dwarf noble
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME's family line extended from the dwarf-lords of old. Other dwarves followed HIS orders without question, and HE always got HIS drinks for free.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Dwarf adventurer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME was an adventurer. HECAP left HIS stronghold in order to pursue wealth and fame throughout the world. HE learned the true value of treasure in HIS travels, and came away with excellent bartering skills.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Dwarf adventurer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME was an adventurer. HE left HIS stronghold in order to pursue wealth and fame throughout the world. HE learned the true value of treasure in HIS travels, and came away with excellent bartering skills.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Dwarf toymaker
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: A dwarf who loves to spread joy to little children, NAME has dedicated HIS art to toymaking.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Dwarf brewmaster
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: If there is one thing dwarves love most in this world, it's ale. NAME provides.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Dwarf cook
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME provides all HIS kin with meals hot and ready like freshly forged steel. HISCAP expertise with hammering out dough is renowned in the halls of the underground kingdoms.
